name: Pixabay
description: A vast collection of free stock videos available for commercial and noncommercial use without requiring attribution.

name: Pexels
description: A comprehensive library of free stock videos available for personal and commercial use without the need for attribution.

name: Coverr
description: A collection of free stock videos that can be used for both commercial and non-commercial projects without requiring attribution.

name: ISO Republic
description: A rich source of free stock videos available under the CC0 license for unrestricted use in your projects.

name: Focastock
description: A diverse collection of free stock videos available under the CC0 license, suitable for any project.

name: Videezy
description: A platform offering a wide range of free and premium stock videos with various licensing options to suit your needs.

name: Mixkit
description: A free stock video site providing high-quality videos for personal and commercial use under the Mixkit Stock Video Free License.

name: Vidsplay
description: A collection of free stock videos available with attribution, suitable for both personal and commercial projects.

name: Dareful
description: A source of free stock videos available under the CC BY 4.0 DEED license, allowing for creative use with attribution.

name: Mazwai
description: A platform offering free stock videos with multiple licensing options, including CC-BY 3.0 with attribution and Mazwai License without attribution.

name: Vimeo
description: A community group on Vimeo providing free HD stock videos for use in various projects.

name: Videvo
description: A resource for free stock videos available under multiple licenses, including Videvo Attribution License and CC BY 3.0.
